1010000110111100 0001001001110001 0 -> sum: 1011010000101101, cout: 0
1000110101110000 0100001111000000 1 -> sum: 1101000100110001, cout: 0
1111000000111010 0111101110001100 0 -> sum: 0110101111000110, cout: 1
1011000011101100 0000001010010110 0 -> sum: 1011001110000010, cout: 0
0110001101100001 0101101011010111 0 -> sum: 1011111000111000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
